00035 {
00056     class _OgreGLES2Export GLSLESProgramPipeline : public GLSLESProgramCommon
00057     {
00058     public:
00060         GLSLESProgramPipeline(GLSLESGpuProgram* vertexProgram, GLSLESGpuProgram* fragmentProgram);
00061         virtual ~GLSLESProgramPipeline();
00062

00065 
00069         virtual void updateUniforms(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params, uint16 mask, GpuProgramType fromProgType);
00073         virtual void updatePassIterationUniforms(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params);
00074

00078

00081

00084             VERTEX_PROGRAM_LINKED = 0x01,
